session.out: Logout! Please, Rescan the QR Code!

module.textpro_null: _Sorry, Cannot Find Any Style Like This.._
module.welcome:
{%d1}```{%c}welcome``` 
{%d1}_Automatically sends messages to new members who join the group._ 
{%d1} 

ðŸ”¹ ```{%c}welcome``` 
ðŸ”¹ ```{%c}welcome Welcome The Group``` 
ðŸ”¹ ```{%c}welcome delete``` (Removes the Message) 
 ðŸ”¹ ```{%c}welcome <reply a message>``` 

*Additional Features:* 

{gpp}: _Welcome message is sent with group profile photo._ 
{img}: _Welcome message is sent with any picture._
Example: _{img: https://i.hizliresim.com/ifo5s63.jpg}_

{vid}: _The welcome message is sent via video._
Example: _{vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OuajHe9SdSk}_
module.goodbye:
{%d1}```{%c}goodbye``` 
{%d1}_Automatically sends messages to new members who leave the group._ 
{%d1} 

ðŸ”¹ ```{%c}goodbye``` 
ðŸ”¹ ```{%c}goodbye Goodbye Mate..``` 
ðŸ”¹ ```{%c}goodbye delete``` (Removes the Message) 
 ðŸ”¹ ```{%c}goodbye <reply a message>``` 

*Additional Features:* 

{gpp}: _Goodbye message is sent with group profile photo._ 
{img}: _Goodbye message is sent with any picture._
Example: _{img: https://i.hizliresim.com/ifo5s63.jpg}_

{vid}: _The goodbye message is sent via video._
Example: _{vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OuajHe9SdSk}_
module.not_set_welcome: _No welcome messages are set for this chat!_
module.alr_set_welcome: _Welcome message is set in this chat. Message:
module.not_set_goodbye: _No goodbye messages are set for this chat._
module.alr_set_goodbye: _Goodbye message is set in this chat. Message:_
module.no_pfp: *Group picture not available. Therefore, the welcome message could not be sent. Please set a group photo!*
module.error_img: *The image in the entered {img: ..} is not valid. Please type* ```.menu welcome``` *to see usage. There should be no additional spaces and the image link should have a .png or .jpg extension.*
module.error_vid: *The youtube link in the entered {vid: ..} is not valid. Please type* ```.menu welcome``` *to see usage. There should be no additional spaces and the video should be youtube link.*
